serverProxy

Class ClientCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverProxy.ClientCommunicator

  • public class ClientCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    A facade for all of the possible IRequests and IResponses that can be submitted through an IServer
    Author:
    Jacob Glad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientCommunicator(IServer server)
      Creates a client communicator that will communicate with the given IServer

                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the /users/register endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        True if the user is created, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Postcondition:
        The user is created if it did not exist

      • joinGame

        public boolean joinGame(int id,
                        java.lang.String color)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the games/join endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        id -
        color -
        Returns:
        True if the game was joined, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        The player has a valid catan.user cookie set. , The player may join the game because there is space, or they are already in the game 

      • getGame

        public ClientModel getGame(java.lang.Integer modelNumber)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the game/model endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        modelNumber -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel representing the game for the give model number, null if the game model number is up to date
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        The player has a valid catan.user and catan.game id
        Postcondition:
        The model is updated if necessary 

      • resetGame

        public ClientModel resetGame()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the game/reset endpoint on the server
        Returns:
        The ClientModel of the resetted game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        The player has a valid catan.user and catan.game id 

      • addAi

        public boolean addAi(java.lang.String aiType)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the game/addAi endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        aiType -
        Returns:
        True if the AI was added, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        The player has a valid catan.user and catan.game id, There is space in the game for an AI player  
        Postcondition:
        The AI player is added to the next open spot in the game in the poster’s catan.game cookie

      • listAi

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> listAi()

        Calls the game/listAi endpoint on the server
        Returns:
        A list of AI types
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendChat

        public ClientModel sendChat(java.lang.String message,
                            int playerIndex)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the games/sendChat endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        message -
        playerIndex -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Postcondition:
        The chat contains your message at the end

      • rollDice

        public ClientModel rollDice(int number,
                            int playerIndex)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/rollNumber endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        number -
        playerIndex -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        The client model’s status is ‘rolling’ , It’s your turn 
        Postcondition:
        The client model’s status is now in ‘discarding’ or ‘robbing’ or ‘playing’ 

      • robPlayer

        public ClientModel robPlayer(int playerIndex,
                             int victimIndex,
                             HexLocation location)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/robPlayer endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        victimIndex -
        location -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn , The client model status is 'Playing' , The robber isn't being kept in the same place , The player to rob has cards (­1 if you can’t rob anyone)
        Postcondition:
        The robber is in the new location, The player to rob gives one random resource card to the robbing player

      • endTurn

        public ClientModel endTurn(int playerIndex)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/finishTurn endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing'
        Postcondition:
        It’s the next players turn 

      • buyDevCard

        public ClientModel buyDevCard(int playerIndex)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/buyDevCard endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing', You have the resources (1 ore, 1 wheat, 1 sheep), There are dev cards left in the deck 
        Postcondition:
        You have the new card, If it is a monument card, it goes into the old devcard hand, If it’s any other card, it goes into the new devcard hand (unplayable this turn)

      • yearOfPlenty

        public ClientModel yearOfPlenty(int playerIndex,
                                ResourceType resource1,
                                ResourceType resource2)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/year_of_plenty endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        resource1 -
        resource2 -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        You have the specific card you want to play in your 'old dev card hand' , You haven't played a dev card this turn yet , It's your turn , The client model status is 'Playing' , The two resources you specify are in the bank 
        Postcondition:
        You gain the two resources specified 

      • roadBuilding

        public ClientModel roadBuilding(int playerIndex,
                                EdgeLocation edge1,
                                EdgeLocation edge2)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/road_building endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        edge1 -
        edge2 -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        You have the specific card you want to play in your 'old dev card hand' , You haven't played a dev card this turn yet , It's your turn , The client model status is 'Playing' , The first road location is connected to one of your roads , The second road location is connected to one of your roads or the Previous location , Neither location is on water , You have two roads 
        Postcondition:
        You use two roads , The map lists the roads correctly

        playerIndex -
        victimIndex -
        location -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        You have the specific card you want to play in your 'old dev card hand' , You haven't played a dev card this turn yet , It's your turn , The client model status is 'Playing' , The robber isn't being kept in the same place , The player to rob has cards (­1 if you can’t rob anyone)
        Postcondition:
        The robber is in the new location, The player to rob gives one random resource card to the player playing the soldier

        public ClientModel monopoly(int playerIndex,
                            ResourceType resource)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/monopoly endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        resource -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        You have the specific card you want to play in your 'old dev card hand' , You haven't played a dev card this turn yet , It's your turn , The client model status is 'Playing' , The two resources you specify are in the bank 
        Postcondition:
        All other players lose the resource card type chosen , The player of the card gets an equal numbe

      • monument

        public ClientModel monument(int playerIndex)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/monument endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        You have the specific card you want to play in your 'old dev card hand' , You haven't played a dev card this turn yet , It's your turn , The client model status is 'Playing' 
        Postcondition:
        You gain a victory point 

      • buildRoad

        public ClientModel buildRoad(int playerIndex,
                             EdgeLocation roadLocation,
                             boolean free)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/buildRoad endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        roadLocation -
        free -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing', The road location is open , The road location is connected to another road you own , The road location is not on water , You have the resources (1 wood, 1 brick; 1 road) 
        Postcondition:
        You expend the resources to play the road (1 wood, 1 brick; 1 road), The map lists the road correctly

      • buildSettlement

        public ClientModel buildSettlement(int playerIndex,
                                   VertexLocation vertexLocation,
                                   boolean free)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/buildSettlement endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        vertexLocation -
        free -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing', The settlement location is open , The settlement location is not on water , The settlement location is connected to one of your roads , You have the resources (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep; 1 settlement) 
        Postcondition:
        You expend the resources to play the settlement (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep; 1 settlement), The map lists the settlement correctly 

      • buildCity

        public ClientModel buildCity(int playerIndex,
                             VertexLocation vertexLocation)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/buildCity endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        vertexLocation -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing', The city location is where you currently have a settlement , You have the resources (2 wheat, 3 ore; 1 city) 
        Postcondition:
        You expend the resources to play the settlement (2 wheat, 3 ore; 1 city), You get a settlement back , The map lists the city correctly

      • offerTrade

        public ClientModel offerTrade(int playerIndex,
                              ResourceList offer,
                              int receiver)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/offerTrade endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        offer -
        receiver -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing', You have the resource 
        Postcondition:
        The trade is offered to the other player (stored in the model)  

      • acceptTrade

        public ClientModel acceptTrade(int playerIndex,
                               boolean willAccept)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/acceptTrade endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        willAccept -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        You have been offered a domestic trade, You have the  resources 
        Postcondition:
        If you accepted, you and the player who offered swap the specified resouces, If you declined no resources are changed, The trade offer is removed

      • maritimeTrade

        public ClientModel maritimeTrade(int playerIndex,
                                 int ratio,
                                 ResourceType inputResource,
                                 ResourceType outputResource)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/maritimeTrade endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        playerIndex -
        ratio -
        inputResource -
        outputResource -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The client model status is 'Playing', You have the resources, You have access to the specified ratio for the specified resource
        Postcondition:
        You ratio of the input resource, You gain 1 of the output resource

      • discardCards

        public ClientModel discardCards(ResourceList discardedCards,
                                int playerIndex)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Calls the moves/discardCards endpoint on the server
        Parameters:
        discardedCards -
        playerIndex -
        Returns:
        A ClientModel containing the current state of the game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Precondition:
        The state of the client model is 'Discarding', You have over 7 cards, You have the cards you're choosing to discard 
        Postcondition:
        If you're the last one to discard, the client model status changes to 'Robbing' , You give up the specified resources
